alert.note: Alert for Lebanon; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:58PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN SCHUYLKILL AND NORTHWESTERN LEBANON COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM EDT... At 257 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northwest of Myerstown, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pine Grove, Tremont, Tower City, Donaldson, Harper Tavern, Lickdale, Fort Indiantown Gap, Jonestown, Hegins, Ravine, Muir, Orwin, Newtown and Ono. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
